items.name: boat
items.desc: It's a basic boat to let you cross water.

items.name: teleporter module
items.desc: Teleports you anywhere on the map once.

items.name: solid gold block
items.desc: It's insanely heavy and valuable. Don't lose it.

items.name: gumpshroom
items.desc: This came from the ground. Apparently some cultures use this as a currency.

items.name: quaggy
items.desc: Similar to gumpshrooms, these are used as currency in a few cultures.

items.name: small round ball
items.desc: This tiny orb is extremely smooth.

items.name: clagger
items.desc: This rare and powerful weapon shoots blasts of pure energy, making everything move much faster.
